Title: Taisei Kensetsu: Vietnam Noi Bai Kuukou
Description: ['A 30-second animated commercial for the construction company Taisei. The commercial highlights Terminal 2 of Nội Bài International Airport that Taisei built in Hanoi, Vietnam.']
Staff: [['Shinkai, Makoto', 'Director, Episode Director, Storyboard, Setting, Editing'], ['Tanji, Takumi', 'Background Art'], ['Tsuchiya, Kenichi', 'Key Animation, Character Design, Animation Director']]
